sourcesContent:
List of books

  • Name : {{book.name | titlecase}}
    ISBN : {{book.isbn | titlecase}}
    Authors :
    • {{author | titlecase}}
    Publisher : {{book.publisher | titlecase}}
    Media type : {{book.mediaType | titlecase}}
    Country : {{book.country | titlecase}}
    Released : {{getDate(book.released)}}
    Number of pages : {{book.numberOfPages}}
